@@ -41,0 +41,5 @@
+// Disable -Wdangling-pointer which is introduced in GCC 12.
+#if !defined(__clang_major__) && (__GNUC__ >= 12)
+#define PRAGMA_DANGLING_POINTER_IGNORED PRAGMA_DISABLE_GCC_WARNING("-Wdangling-pointer")
+#endif
+
